event.description: Grady Sizemore grounds out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to pitcher Brian Tallet.
Asdrubal Cabrera flies out to left fielder Adam Lind.
Victor Martinez walks.
Shin-Soo Choo hit by pitch. Victor Martinez to 2nd.
Mark DeRosa strikes out swinging.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Ryan Garko pops out to second baseman Aaron Hill.
Matt LaPorta pops out to first baseman Lyle Overbay in foul territory.
Ben Francisco flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Grady Sizemore strikes out swinging.
Asdrubal Cabrera strikes out swinging.
Victor Martinez flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Shin-Soo Choo pops out to third baseman Scott Rolen in foul territory.
Mark DeRosa strikes out swinging.
Jhonny Peralta walks.
Ryan Garko reaches on a force attempt, throwing error by third baseman Scott Rolen. Jhonny Peralta to 2nd.
Matt LaPorta grounds into a force out, third baseman Scott Rolen to second baseman Aaron Hill. Jhonny Peralta to 3rd. Ryan Garko out at 2nd. Matt LaPorta to 1st.
Ben Francisco flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
With Grady Sizemore batting, wild pitch by Brian Tallet, Matt LaPorta to 2nd.
Grady Sizemore grounds out to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Asdrubal Cabrera grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Victor Martinez lines out to third baseman Scott Rolen.
Shin-Soo Choo walks.
Mark DeRosa flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Jhonny Peralta called out on strikes.
Ryan Garko singles on a line drive to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Matt LaPorta homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Ryan Garko scores.
Ben Francisco singles on a bunt ground ball to pitcher Brian Tallet.
Grady Sizemore doubles (7) on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Ben Francisco to 3rd.
Asdrubal Cabrera reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by shortstop Marco Scutaro. Ben Francisco scores.
Victor Martinez flies out to right fielder Alex Rios. Grady Sizemore to 3rd.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Jose Bautista remains in the game as the left fielder.
Pitching Change: Brandon League replaces Brian Tallet.
Mark DeRosa singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Jhonny Peralta grounds into a double play, shortstop Marco Scutaro to second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Mark DeRosa out at 2nd.
Ryan Garko grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Kevin Millar remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter David Dellucci replaces Matt LaPorta.
David Dellucci singles on a ground ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Josh Barfield replaces David Dellucci.
Ben Francisco out on a sacrifice bunt, first baseman Lyle Overbay to second baseman Aaron Hill. Josh Barfield to 2nd.
Grady Sizemore flies out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Josh Barfield scores. Asdrubal Cabrera to 2nd on the throw.
Victor Martinez doubles (8) on a fly ball to center fielder Vernon Wells. Asdrubal Cabrera scores.
Shin-Soo Choo singles on a line drive to center fielder Vernon Wells. Victor Martinez scores.
With Mark DeRosa batting, Shin-Soo Choo steals (6) 2nd base.
Mark DeRosa grounds out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to pitcher Brandon League.
Pitching Change: Jason Frasor replaces Brandon League.
Jhonny Peralta flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Ryan Garko singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Josh Barfield singles on a sharp ground ball to pitcher Jason Frasor. Ryan Garko to 2nd.

Ben Francisco flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Pitching Change: Bill Murphy replaces Jason Frasor.
Grady Sizemore flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
John McDonald remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitching Change: Shawn Camp replaces Bill Murphy.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Victor Martinez grounds into a double play, second baseman Aaron Hill to shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Asdrubal Cabrera out at 2nd.

Grady Sizemore doubles (8) on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Luis Valbuena scores. Josh Barfield scores. Grady Sizemore advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by second baseman Aaron Hill.
Asdrubal Cabrera grounds out, pitcher Shawn Camp to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Marco Scutaro called out on strikes.

Vernon Wells flies out to center fielder Grady Sizemore.
